English: We draws a northern fantasy RPG world based on "Blockchain Network".
Korean: We draws a northern fantasy RPG world based on "Blockchain Network".

English: Game data will be stored in Blocks
Korean: Game data will be stored in Blocks

English: Nine Chronicles stores game data on a long chain of blocks called <Blockchain>.

English: Blockchain means Nine Chronicles is a fully decentralized game and powered by the players.
Korean: Blockchain means Nine Chronicles is a fully decentralized game and powered by the players.

English: Intro is over. Create your avatar first.

English: We designed all 4 classes, but the Warrior is only availlable currently. Warrior is a melee. sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.
Korean: We designed all 4 classes, but the Warrior is only availlable currently. Warrior is a melee. sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.
